resources.string:
Secret Codes is an Open Source application that allows you to scan the secret codes available on your Android device through the dialer app. If you want more info about it, follow these links:

•  CSDN Community Share your features requests, bugs, …
•  Github Pages Description of the project
•  Github repository Source code of the project
•  My personal website About me, and other projects
There is no secret code on your device…
Your device isn\'t compatible…\nTry to execute the code directly from the dialer app.
